feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Ariba Buying and Invoicing
feed.subtitle: SAP Ariba Buying and Invoicing Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Ariba - SLP and Buying and Invoicing - are there WSDLs to integrate Master Data with other ERPs?
entry.content:
Ariba - SLP and Buying and Invoicing - are there WSDLs to integrate Master Data with other ERPs?

We need to integrate as well as monitor the outcome of the integrations for master data. We have a custom field whose data is brought over using the master data/import batch data and will need to be sending data to Ariba at least every 5 minutes.
I know there are the manual csv file options. this seems very clunky and archaic for the year 2025.  Are there web services available so this can be automated or i guess how are other non-SAP companies automating the data feeds?

Thanks!

entry.title: Ariba invoice notifications- multiple emails
entry.content:
Hello,

We are seeing 100 of duplicate emails sent out this morning from Ariba for invoice approval.

Has anyone seen similar issues today?

Thanks

entry.title: How to configure automatic Good Receipt for a Condition Value of Total Order Amount?
entry.content:
Hello,

I am trying to configure automatic goods receipts in SAP Ariba for a client that demands setting up the Automatic receiving for different Total Order Amount values threshold for different company codes.

I have put the following fields in the Condition Value 1 - Requisition.TotalCost.Amount AND Requisition.CompanyCode.UniqueName in Condition Value 2 fields.

However, how do I configure in the Excel (ReceiptByCommodityCode.csv) that the Total Amount of the PR should be less than this value that I put in this column?

entry.title: Approval flow should trigger in Ariba when 'Ship To' field is changed in Requisition next versions
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Could you please help us with the following?

When a Purchase Requisition (PR) is fully ordered, and the requester/preparer makes changes to the "Ship To" field in next Versions of the PR, the approval flow should be triggered in the subsequent versions.

We would like the PO Admin group to appear in the approval flow whenever requester/preparer makes changes to Ship To" field in next Versions of the PR changes are made in the changed PO.

entry.title: Ariba SOX Audit
entry.content:
Hi,

How are other people managing the auditing of Ariba? In our company Ariba is a SOX application and so we have twice yearly internal and external audits. 

Due to the Ariba role structure, our support team need Customer Admin access pretty much all the time to help with with ticket. Customer Admin is an auditable role and so we must download and review the audit logs regularly, we also must make screenshots of the download because the audit logs themselves do not make it clear which environment and date range have been used in their creation. 

The download of logs and evidence and the review of this is very time consuming, how are other people doing this please?

entry.title: SAP Business Network Buyer Purchase Order template/layout
entry.content:
Hi,

I am looking for the purchase order templates stored in our company's Ariba Network buyer account. 

Can somebody guide me as an administrator, where can I find the template that the business network uses to generat PO from buyer account? 

We need to look into the fields and locations of each section and would need to amend some of those.

Thank you,

entry.title: Taxonomy Update in Ariba
entry.content:
Hi Experts

As part of Procurement transformation, our client would like to implement new Taxonomy Structure (Commodity Codes) in Ariba. This will require a complete overhaul of the existing commodity code nomenclature and structure along with creation of new material groups in S/4 especially for commodity codes associated with Direct Materials. Meanwhile we are currently in middle of Ariba rollout with UAT and Go-Live pending for Sourcing, SLP, Contract and Buying & Invoicing modules.

We will like to have a technical overview of the impact of the Taxonomy change on the current rollout and feasibility of carrying out both the projects in parallel. If we start the taxonomy change in Ariba, simultaneously, how it may impact the current rollout UAT, Cut-Over and Go-Live?

Thank you

Manish

entry.title: Ariba: Rejection approval flow doesn't trigger on IRs
entry.content:
Has anyone implemented a specific approval to trigger if someone in the IR approval flow clicks on Reject?

We've turned Application.Invoicing.RejectRequiresNoMoreApprovals to No and we've tried using InvoiceReconciliation.IsForReject and InvoiceReconciliation.cus_MarkforReject on our approval rules to have a specific approval after rejection. When using the testing tab of the IR Approval Flow, we see the wanted behavour.

But on the actual approvable document, unless something else is first changed in the IR, after clicking on Reject, the approval flow is not resubmitted and regenerated as we need it to. 

Ariba Support suggest to log a customisation request based on what's written at the bottom here: https://help.sap.com/docs/buying-invoicing/approval-process-management-guide/default-approval-process-for-invoice-reconciliation-documents-for-credit-memos-6b941434c1da101496f78f16a2c6b546

But this talks about adding an approval group to rejected IR documents without exceptions. In our cases, we have exceptions and that makes no difference.

I'm confused as to what sort of customisation will trigger the resubmit of the approval flow after the Reject button is pushed. If anyone here has enabled such a customisation, could you please describe it?

thanks

Cathy

entry.title: Ariba - Discount change in PR / PO (ERP Integration)
entry.content:
Hi Community, 

currently we have a customer case and a open question how we handle with discounts changes in purchase orders of SAP Ariba Buying.

We recognized when changing a discount in Purchase Requisition (Ariba) that the discount will be added in S/4HANA Purchase Order as new line in the calculation scheme. 

Our customer has now the case that the discount should be changed or should be added (Insert). So for the customer both cases are possible. As a standard it's only added. 

Is there any best practice for such a case? 

Thanks & Best regards, 

Stefan

entry.content:

No duplication in the IDOCS,

entry.title: Parent/Child Vendor Relationships (Hierarchy) in Ariba
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are currently exploring an enhancement for one of our clients involving Parent/Child Vendor Relationships in SAP Ariba, and we would appreciate your insights or guidance on how best to approach this.

Current Setup:

  • Vendor records are created and maintained in S/4HANA via MDG, and synchronized with SAP Ariba twice daily.
  • In Ariba, each vendor is created as a standalone entry, resulting in multiple listings for the same company (e.g., Microsoft, U.S. Bank, Amazon), often representing different business units or geographies.
  • This leads to confusion during vendor selection, as users must manually identify the correct vendor from a long list.

Business Requirement:

  • Display only a single vendor option (parent) during selection in Ariba Buying.
  • Enable spend reporting to be consolidated across all associated child vendors.

Request for Guidance:

  • Is there a native capability in Ariba to support parent/child vendor relationships?
  • If not, are there any recommended configurations, workarounds, or best practices to achieve this?
  • Has anyone implemented a similar solution or enhancement?

Any documentation, experience, or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your support!
SAP Ariba Spend Analysis SAP Ariba Invoice Management , SAP Ariba Sourcing SAP Ariba Supplier Risk SAP Ariba Buying and Invoicing SAP Supplier Lifecycle Management

entry.title: The subject lines of emails sent from Ariba do not display in the language configured in Ariba when
entry.content:
Hello, I am a consultant working on an indirect procurement reform project using SAP Ariba at a manufacturer.

Regarding notification emails sent from Ariba (e.g., approval requests), the following issues have been observed:
・In Outlook, portions of the subject line text sometimes appear in a language different from the language set in Ariba (Japanese), such as English.
・This occurs not only in the live environment at the client company but also in the test environment.

SAP investigated, but they stated that identifying the cause and developing countermeasures is difficult due to the inherent complexity of the root cause analysis.

The operational impact is as follows:
Users routinely process large volumes of document approvals and creation daily. Consequently, many rely on email filtering based on subject lines.
If email subjects partially contain a different language (English), users utilizing filtering functions may experience missed approvals or confirmations. This could lead to operational delays.

entry.content:
Hi, Community Members,

In SAP Ariba B&I, is there any way to make Master Data-"Commodity Code with HSN" available at Supplier Ariba Portal as dropdown Selection field to Select while creating a Non- PO Invoice.?

entry.title: Career Advice: Choosing Between SAP Ariba, EWM, and PP
entry.content:
Hello, 

I’m an Industrial Engineer with no prior work experience, but I speak four languages — English, German, Turkish, and Arabic. I’ve recently completed hands-on training in SAP MM and am now planning to learn another SAP module to strengthen my career path.

My goal is to build a strong professional profile and find good job opportunities in the Gulf region, where SAP is in high demand. I want to choose a module that aligns with my industrial engineering background, complements my SAP MM knowledge, leverages my language skills, and offers long-term career stability — even with the growing impact of AI and automation.

Currently, I’m considering 1) SAP Ariba(e.g., Procurement, Supplier Management, Sourcing ..) and 2) SAP EWM. I am also thinking about SAP PP, but I believe its opportunities are limited, as it is mostly confined to the industrial sector. Additionally, I would like advice on whether to focus on Cloud Private Edition or On-Premise for SAP MM and the next module.

Which module and deployment type would you recommend to help me stay competitive and future-proof my career in the Gulf market?

Thank you very much for your advice!

entry.title: Need to update HSN code in PR/PO during creation from ARIBA Guided Buying to SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD
entry.content:
Dear All,

We are trying to integrate PR from ARIBA GUIDED BUYING to SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD and further create PO.

We have created PR in SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD. Further using Automatic PO creation app, we are creating PO. 

For india country, we have BR_NCM field for HSN code in PO item. But the same field is not available in PR item. How we can achieve this updating of HSN/SAC code in PO India tab from ARIBA GB.

Is there anyway, can we directly initiate creation of PO from ARIBA GB ? If no, what we can do for HSN code field?

Regards

Sudharsanan

entry.title: Ariba Invoice : Total Amount not getting added correctly
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I am facing issue in Invoice for 1 supplier only. Where the Invoice total amount is not calculated correctly leaving the tax amount. By looking at the post processing payload the tax value(MWSBT :17.92)  is not added to the net price(BETRG:94.29).

In my below screenshot on the left side is the issue payload where Net Price + Tax is not calculated to the field "SUMME".

Right side screenshot is for different supplier payload where the Total amount is calculated correctly.

I could see a difference in 2 field's MSATZ and TXJCD value differs i.e  MSATZ = 19.000 & TXJCD = 3  / 1 . Is this causing any issue? What could be the reason?

also, can I just replace SAP Ariba with SAP Ariba CIM without impacting my suppliers at all?

entry.title: Prametric Catalog Items in 3EN Szenario
entry.content:
Hello,

In my Ariba Buying project, the client wants to use parametric catalog items. For example with T-Shirt size: S, M, L as a parametric field. The integration scenario is 3EN with Central Procurement. Ariba therefore creates a PR in Central Procurement.

The question is: how is the parametric data transferred from Ariba to the PR in Central Procurement? What is the best practice standard for this?

Thanks and regards, Christian

entry.title: Hello Experts, one of the SES is stuck in "Rejecting" status in Ariba.
entry.content:
Hello Experts, one of the SES is stuck in "Rejecting" status in Ariba, it was supposed to reach ECC via CIG, could you provide your expertise & help me resolve / trouble shoot the issue, please. 

Normal expected behaviour: SES rejected in Ariba > Message reaches CIG > update in ECC.

Current behaviour: SES stuck in Ariba itself (in Rejecting status) for days, the message not reached CIG (not appearing in TT).
